## Developer Guide

If you are new to using `nbdev` here are some useful pointers to get you
started.

### Install vision_cad in Development mode

``` sh
# make sure vision_cad package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to vision_cad
$ nbdev_prepare
```

## Usage

### Installation

Install latest from the GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/ramonpr/vision-cad):

``` sh
$ pip install git+https://github.com/ramonpr/vision-cad.git
```

or from [conda](https://anaconda.org/ramonpr/vision-cad)

``` sh
$ conda install -c ramonpr vision_cad
```

or from [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/vision-cad/)

``` sh
$ pip install vision_cad
```

### Documentation

Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/ramonpr/vision-cad)’s
[pages](https://ramonpr.github.io/vision-cad/). Additionally you can
find package manager specific guidelines on
[conda](https://anaconda.org/ramonpr/vision-cad) and
[pypi](https://pypi.org/project/vision-cad/) respectively.
